Package com.pandora.config.services

Class ReactionConfigurationBeanServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.pandora.config.services.ReactionConfigurationBeanServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReactionConfigurationBeanService
@Service public class ReactionConfigurationBeanServiceImpl extends Object implements ReactionConfigurationBeanService
The ReactionConfigurationBeanServiceImpl service class provides methods for managing and retrieving ReactionConfiguration instances within the application. It uses the Spring framework's ApplicationContext for obtaining bean configurations and indexing ReactionConfiguration instances based on their order of appearance in the configuration. The class implements the ReactionConfigurationBeanService interface to expose methods for retrieving reaction configurations and specific reactions based on their names, indices, and instances.

Developers using or extending the ReactionConfigurationBeanServiceImpl class should be aware of the applicationContext field, which provides access to the Spring application context for retrieving beans and components during runtime. Additionally, the indexedReactionConfigurations list is populated during the initialization phase to provide a sequential order for accessing reaction configurations by index.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek

  • Method Details

    • getAllReactions

      public final Map<String,ReactionConfiguration> getAllReactions()
      Description copied from interface: ReactionConfigurationBeanService
      Retrieves a map containing all available reaction configurations. The keys are strings representing the names of the reactions, and the values are the corresponding ReactionConfiguration instances.
      Specified by:
      getAllReactions in interface ReactionConfigurationBeanService
      Returns:
      A Map containing all available reaction configurations.

    • getReactionConfiguration

      public final ReactionConfiguration getReactionConfiguration(String name)
      Description copied from interface: ReactionConfigurationBeanService
      Retrieves the ReactionConfiguration associated with the specified reaction name.
      Specified by:
      getReactionConfiguration in interface ReactionConfigurationBeanService
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the reaction for which to retrieve the configuration.
      Returns:
      The ReactionConfiguration associated with the specified name, or null if no configuration is found.

    • getReactionConfiguration

      public final ReactionConfiguration getReactionConfiguration(int i)
      Description copied from interface: ReactionConfigurationBeanService
      Retrieves the ReactionConfiguration associated with the reaction at the specified index. The index is used to identify the position of the reaction configuration in the underlying data structure.
      Specified by:
      getReactionConfiguration in interface ReactionConfigurationBeanService
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the reaction for which to retrieve the configuration.
      Returns:
      The ReactionConfiguration associated with the specified index, or null if no configuration is found.

    • initialize

      @PostConstruct public void initialize()
      The initialize method in the ReactionConfigurationBeanServiceImpl class is annotated with PostConstruct, indicating that it should be executed after the bean has been constructed. This method populates the indexedReactionConfigurations list with instances of ReactionConfiguration. It retrieves all available reaction configurations using the getAllReactions() method and adds them to the list for efficient index-based access.

      Developers using or extending the ReactionConfigurationBeanServiceImpl class should be aware that the initialize method is automatically invoked after the bean is constructed, providing an opportunity to set up initial conditions, populate collections, or perform any necessary setup steps specific to this service.
